title: Favorite James Bond actor in the United States 2018
summary: This statistic presents the most common digital payment methods that North American retailers accept or plan to accept . As of 2018 , 36 percent of responding North American retailers were already accepting customer payments via paypal with 34 percent planning on accepting the payment method within the next 2 years . mobile payment usage mobile payments have become increasingly main stream in the country as an increasing number of users take advantage of the conveniences of digital payment options .
gold: The statistic shows the most favorable James Bond actors according to adults in the United States as of November 2018 . The findings reveal that Sean Connery was the favorite among survey respondents , with 61 percent stating that they had a very favorable impression of the actor 's interpretation of James Bond . A total of 51 percent said the same about Pierce Brosnan .
